mapper.update: update t_ad set script = #{script},enable_status = #{enableStatus},operator = #{operator},operate_time = now() where id = #{id} and delete_status = 'NotDelete'
mapper.select: select id,site,script,enable_status as enableStatus,delete_status as deleteStatus,operator,operate_time as operateTime,creator,create_time as createTime from t_ad where delete_status = 'NotDelete'
